segment.source: How to find the right help for Intune by itself or with Configuration Manager

segment.source: How to find the right help for Intune by itself or with Configuration Manager
segment.target: How to find the right help for Intune by itself or with Configuration Manager

segment.source: When you work with by itself, you'll find all the information you need in this documentation library.
segment.target: When you work with by itself, you'll find all the information you need in this documentation library.

segment.source: However, if you've decided to use and together (what's known as a 'hybrid' scenario), most operations that you used to perform in the admin console will now need to be done in the console instead.
segment.target: However, if you've decided to use and together (what's known as a 'hybrid' scenario), most operations that you used to perform in the admin console will now need to be done in the console instead.

segment.source: Once you set up a hybrid scenario, you'll find the help you need in the Configuration Manager documentation library.
segment.target: Once you set up a hybrid scenario, you'll find the help you need in the Configuration Manager documentation library.

segment.source: This topic helps you to find the documentation for an operation both before and after you link to .
segment.target: This topic helps you to find the documentation for an operation both before and after you link to .
